Vonda Sue Mayers (Blessing)

August 29, 2024

Vonda Sue Mayers age 60, passed away on Aug. 20, 2024, in Weatherford, Texas. Born on Aug. 16, 1964, in Lewistown, Vonda’s life was marked by her deep love for her family and her community. Vonda spent much of her career as a cashier at various truck stops around Weatherford, Texas. She was ...

Katie L. Yoder

August 29, 2024

Katie L. Yoder, 87, of Belleville, passed away at 11:30 a.m. on Wednesday, Aug. 28, 2024. She was the wife of the late Jonas D. Yoder. She was born on June 13, 1937, to the late Daniel and Arie (Peachey) Bender. Surviving is a sister, Emma Peight, wife of Daniel, of Belleville; a ...

John Robert Flynn Jr.

August 29, 2024

John Robert Flynn Jr. 83 of Lewistown, passed away on Friday, Aug. 2, 2024 at William Penn Nursing Home and Rehabilitation Center. John was born on July 26, 1941 in Royersford. He is survived by his wife Clare. He was preceded in death by his parents John Robert Flynn Sr. and Frieda Rebecca ...

Jeffrey Scott Parks

August 29, 2024

Jeffrey Scott Parks, 73, of Lewistown passed away Wednesday, Aug. 28, 2024 at Greenwood Village. Arrangements are under the care of Heller-Hoenstine Woodlawn Funeral Home and will be announced upon completion.

Shirley M. (Burris) Kauffman

August 29, 2024

Shirley M. (Burris) Kauffman, 70, formerly of Thompsontown, passed away Wednesday, Aug. 28, 2024, at William Penn Healthcare, Lewistown. Her service will be private. Guss Funeral Home, Inc., 20 S. Third St., Mifflintown is assisting the family.

Jackie Marie Alters

August 28, 2024

Jackie Marie Alters, 69, of Lewistown, passed away Monday, Aug. 26, 2024, at Geisinger Lewistown Hospital. Born on May 11, 1955, in Bellefonte, she was the daughter of the late Dean W. and Geraldine ‘Dolly’ (Corman) Fetterolf. She is survived by her husband, David A. Alters; children, ...
